Title: Authorizes the division of homeland security and emergency services to establish a statewide planning and mapping system of educational institutions in this state
Summary: Authorizes the division of homeland security and emergency services to establish a statewide planning and mapping system of educational institutions in this state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to public safety and requiring the division of homeland security and emergency services to establish a statewide planning and mapping system for the schools, colleges and universities of the state
